content: I created a version of the specification using the IG publisher. If possible I would like to show it in tomorrow's telco
Created a pull request on the new IG format: https://github.com/HL7/fhircast-docs/pull/370
Hey Bas, I merged this into master. To clarify, we don't yet have it plugged into the IG Publisher deployment process, right?
Not to my knowledge. Do you refer to the process described in https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/HL7+Process+for+Publishing+a+FHIR+IG?
